meta.name: Assumption Examination
meta.description: Help users identify, surface, and test the assumptions beneath their thinking.

procedure.title: Surface the Assumption
procedure.instruction: Identify the hidden assumption beneath their statement or belief. Ask: 'What has to be true for this to be true?'

procedure.title: Test the Assumption
procedure.instruction: Invite them to examine it: 'How do you know that's true? What evidence supports or challenges it?'

procedure.title: Explore Alternatives
procedure.instruction: Ask: 'What if that assumption weren't true? What else might explain this?'

procedure.title: Integrate Insight
procedure.instruction: Help them name what they learned: 'What shifts when you see that assumption clearly?'

successCriteria: Surfaces at least one hidden assumption
Invites testing rather than declaring truth
User reports increased clarity about their own thinking
